message.body: OMG awesome!!! So are we meeting tonight? Or will it be too late?
I think we'll all be there for rehearsal right? If it has to go late thats fine with me
I'm meeting with Heeney to do photos at 7
I will be there. I'm not in the second dance but will def stay if we are meeting
Phinn wants to meet so let's plan on it and hopefully Lois can join
Don't forget to send me poster so I can email it!
I just sent it in an email from my comp, im not sure why it wont send from my pho e
Jessie gave me all the info on the flasks but she said they took 6 weeks to arrive so I guess it's too late. Any ideas? We could try to rush the order?

Lo & Gabi, regarding trading cards. She suggested staying with Fox printing since they've been doing it for years and know the drill. Is that ok with you? She also said we could place a small order first if money is tight and then place a bigger order after the first weekend.
Maybe theres another place that can print on the metal faster? Might even be worth checking with amalgamated culture works(the tshirt place)
